pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulation of Weed Population Dynamics // An environment to simulate the development of annual plant populations with regard to population dynamics and genetics, especially herbicide resistance. It combines genetics on the individual level (Renton et al. 2011) with a stochastic development on the population level (Daedlow, 2015). Renton, M, Diggle, A, Manalil, S and Powles, S (2011) doi:10.1016/j.jtbi.2011.05.010 Daedlow, Daniel (2015, doctoral dissertation: University of Rostock, Faculty of Agriculture and Environmental Sciences.)
